briefdescription.para: Use the last actor list received by the server as the one being read.
Use the temporary actor list stored for a cell as the one being read.

detaileddescription.para: This type of actor list is used to store actor positions and dynamic stats and is deleted when the cell is unloaded.

parameterdescription.para: The description of the cell whose actor list should be read.

briefdescription.para: Clear the data from the actor list stored on the server.
Set the pid attached to the ActorList.

parameterdescription.para: The player ID to whom the actor list should be attached.

briefdescription.para: Take the contents of the read-only actor list last received by the server from a player and move its contents to the stored object list that can be sent by the server.
Get the number of indexes in the read actor list.
Get the action type used in the read actor list.

simplesect.para: The action type (0 for SET, 1 for ADD, 2 for REMOVE, 3 for REQUEST).

briefdescription.para: Get the cell description of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the refId of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the refNum of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the mpNum of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the X position of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the Y position of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the Z position of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the X rotation of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the Y rotation of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the Z rotation of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the base health of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the current health of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the modified health of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the base magicka of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the current magicka of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the modified magicka of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the base fatigue of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the current fatigue of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the modified fatigue of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int index, unsigned short slot) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetActorEquipmentItemRefId

briefdescription.para: Get the refId of the item in a certain slot of the equipment of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.

parameterdescription.para: The slot of the equipment item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int index, unsigned short slot) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetActorEquipmentItemCount

briefdescription.para: Get the count of the item in a certain slot of the equipment of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.

parameterdescription.para: The slot of the equipment item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int index, unsigned short slot) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetActorEquipmentItemCharge

briefdescription.para: Get the charge of the item in a certain slot of the equipment of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.

parameterdescription.para: The slot of the equipment item.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int index, unsigned short slot) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetActorEquipmentItemEnchantmentCharge

briefdescription.para: Get the enchantment charge of the item in a certain slot of the equipment of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.

parameterdescription.para: The slot of the equipment item.

briefdescription.para: Check whether the killer of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list is a player.

simplesect.para: Whether the actor was killed by a player.

briefdescription.para: Get the player ID of the killer of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.

simplesect.para: The player ID of the killer.

briefdescription.para: Get the refId of the actor killer of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the refNum of the actor killer of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the mpNum of the actor killer of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Get the name of the actor killer of the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.
Check whether there is any positional data for the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.

detaileddescription.para: This is only useful when reading the actor list data recorded for a particular cell.

simplesect.para: Whether the read actor list contains positional data.

briefdescription.para: Check whether there is any dynamic stats data for the actor at a certain index in the read actor list.

detaileddescription.para: This is only useful when reading the actor list data recorded for a particular cell.

simplesect.para: Whether the read actor list contains dynamic stats data.

briefdescription.para: Set the cell of the temporary actor list stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: The cell is determined to be an exterior cell if it fits the pattern of a number followed by a comma followed by another number.

briefdescription.para: Set the action type of the temporary actor list stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The action type (0 for SET, 1 for ADD, 2 for REMOVE, 3 for REQUEST).

briefdescription.para: Set the cell of the temporary actor stored on the server.

detaileddescription.para: Used for ActorCellChange packets, where a specific actor's cell now differs from that of the actor list.
The cell is determined to be an exterior cell if it fits the pattern of a number followed by a comma followed by another number.

briefdescription.para: Set the refId of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the refNum of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the mpNum of the temporary actor stored on the server.

memberdef.argsstring: (double x, double y, double z) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetActorPosition

briefdescription.para: Set the position of the temporary actor stored on the server.

memberdef.argsstring: (double x, double y, double z) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetActorRotation

briefdescription.para: Set the rotation of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the base health of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the current health of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the modified health of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the base magicka of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the current magicka of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the modified magicka of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the base fatigue of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the current fatigue of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the modified fatigue of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the sound of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set the AI action of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set a player as the AI target of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Set another object as the AI target of the temporary actor stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The refNum of the target object.
The mpNum of the target object.

memberdef.argsstring: (double x, double y, double z) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetActorAICoordinates

briefdescription.para: Set the coordinates for the AI package associated with the current AI action.
Set the distance of the AI package associated with the current AI action.
Set the duration of the AI package associated with the current AI action.
Set whether the current AI package should be repeated.

detaileddescription.para: Note: This only has an effect on the WANDER package.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the package should be repeated.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short slot, const char *refId, unsigned int count, int charge, double enchantmentCharge=-1) noexcept
memberdef.name: EquipActorItem

briefdescription.para: Equip an item in a certain slot of the equipment of the temporary actor stored on the server.

parameterdescription.para: The enchantment charge of the item.

briefdescription.para: Unequip the item in a certain slot of the equipment of the temporary actor stored on the server.
Add a copy of the server's temporary actor to the server's temporary actor list.

detaileddescription.para: In the process, the server's temporary actor will automatically be cleared so a new one can be set up.

briefdescription.para: Send an ActorList packet.

detaileddescription.para: It is sent only to the player for whom the current actor list was initialized.

briefdescription.para: Send an ActorAuthority packet.

detaileddescription.para: The player for whom the current actor list was initialized is recorded in the server memory as the new actor authority for the actor list's cell.
The packet is sent to that player as well as all other players who have the cell loaded.

briefdescription.para: Send an ActorPosition packet.

parameterdescription.para: Whether this packet should be sent to cell visitors other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).

briefdescription.para: Send an ActorStatsDynamic packet.

parameterdescription.para: Whether this packet should be sent to cell visitors other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).

briefdescription.para: Send an ActorEquipment packet.

parameterdescription.para: Whether this packet should be sent to cell visitors other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).

briefdescription.para: Send an ActorSpeech packet.

parameterdescription.para: Whether this packet should be sent to cell visitors other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).

briefdescription.para: Send an ActorAI packet.

parameterdescription.para: Whether this packet should be sent to cell visitors other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).

briefdescription.para: Send an ActorCellChange packet.

parameterdescription.para: Whether this packet should be sent to cell visitors other than the player attached to the packet (false by default).
Whether the packet should skip being sent to the player attached to the packet (false by default).
